name: i-SlideIn
author: Tho Move Marketing

sections.description:
i-SlideIn will connect to islidein.com server to display your i-SlideIn form using your Account ID and Key fromt islidein.com.

Follow this step to make it work

After you register on islidein.com and create form you will get Account ID and Key.

Install plugin on your WordPrss site

Fill your Account ID and Key

It’s done.

i-SlideIn used JavaScript to get your form from islidein.com

Arbitrary section 1

  • This plugin will connect and use Javascript from islidein.com *
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Setting the plugin through ‘Settings’ menu
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0.3

Release Date – 1st January, 2016

  • First time commit to WordPress SVN *
  • Fixed bugs *
  • Added readme.txt *
